评论概述: Not quite as “blackish-green” as I expected.
评论详情: So the shirt itself has a great fit - I ordered a large which is my normal size.  The fit might be ever so slightly bigger than expected, but nothing to really get worked up about. Just if you are on the smallish side of a large, you might want to order down.  The shirt is soft and silky and the neck line looks very flattering.  The sleeves are a perfect length as is the actual shirt.  But the color is a bit lighter than what I would consider “blackish-green.” I would definitely call it more of an emerald green.
Not good at all

I ordered three colors for fall - white, pink and black.  Ordered XL but they were way too big so I returned for Large.  Fit is much better but it does seem like there is greater difference in the two sizes than I expected.  I normally stick with natural materials, definitely in the summer, but these are ok for Polyester.  Not shiny or too thin.  The colors are good though the white is slightly more “winter white” than bright white, which actually works better for me.  I’m happy with my purchase at the price and expect to get good wear from them.  Haven’t washed yet so if they fail then I’ll revise my review.

I love cowl neck tops for work wear, they're flattering and comfy, looking good with and without a blazer both.  this top is super comfy, and a decently heavy material, so great for fall/winter wear, though definitely too warm for summer wear.
This top is WONDERFUL. I would 100% reccommend this to anyone looking for a good top. Its beautiful and comfy to wear, you won't get tired of this top! 5/5 stars, would buy again

评论概述: Love this top! CAN BE WORN BOTH WAYS!!
评论详情: This is a cool top bc it looks cute both forward & backwards which I never would’ve expected when I ordered it. I love cowl necks, which this is if worn forwards, but with the drape in the back it has an unexpected sexiness to it bc you don’t expect to see any of the back when looking at the front boatneck. The shirt is also a bit more oversized than I expected which is another reason I prefer the drape in the back. This shirt is made from a thin, stretchy, ribbed material that’s breathable & feels nice against the skin. It feels like a poly blend. I ordered it in the beige color, but in person it has a very faint dusty pink tone to it. I help it against a true beige top to show the difference but it didn’t show as well in the pic as it does in person w the light on it. The length of the top looks good front tucked & untucked wo looking messy. It has drop shoulders, which I didn’t expect, & I think that adds to the oversized fit. The lightweight material drapes beautifully but isn’t very warm so I think it’d be nice for cool summer nights, warm fall days or spring. It would also work as a layer during the colder months. You really can’t beat the price at $15 so I plan on ordering more colors probably in 1 size down this time though. I’m typically a medium but sized up to a large & although I like the oversized fit, I’d like to have one slightly more fitted as well. Definitely a very cool & versatile shirt at a great price so it’s something I’d recommend to anyone looking for a cute cowl neck or draped back.

评论概述: Great flattering cut that can be dressed up or down
评论详情: I ordered this to replace a worn shirt in my fall wardrobe; the classic neutral color and timeless style make this a very versatile top, suitable for wearing under a blazer for a meeting, pairing with a skirt for a fall date night, or just elevating a pair of jeans a little bit. The cowl neck style also works well to ensure enough fabric to cover a larger bustline, though it does tend to make the bust look a little larger as well due to the extra fabric creating visual bulk. With the exception of the cowl neckline, this is a pretty basic long-sleeve top; the classic fit isn't too big on fit women, but remains work-appropriate for women with a small bit of tummy pudge or heavier arms.  My only complaint with this is the fabric the manufacturer chose, and that's pretty minor; it's very high polyester and has a bit of a shine to it, which can make this look less than perfectly classy in some lighting. But that also makes it a little less likely to stain from food spills at lunch, or baby spit-up if worn by a childcare teacher, keeping it looking nice longer. The mid-heavy weight is a great choice for a cool-season top, and the drapey nature of this knit makes the cowl neck look good.  Overall, at its current $15 price, it's quite a solid choice for a top for work if you're not in an environment that requires business formal, and it's comfortable enough to wear on days off as well.

My wife really likes this top. The fabric is soft and it fits nicely (and true to size). The green color is the same as the Amazon listing photo. Even after washing, it still fits the same and looks new. She really likes the collar design and professional look.

Love the neckline.  I have others with this neckline but most are sleeveless or short sleeved.  This is my only one with long sleeves but it is not too uncomfortable to wear in the summer.  I'm so happy I found it.  Nice fabric, soft and comfortable.  Recommended
Flattering and figure complimenting. Good for almost every formal occasion. Comfortable to wear and easy to care for. Made from good quality
Soft and comfy shirt

评论概述: Easy Way to Add a Little Something Different to Your Work Wardrobe
评论详情: This long sleeve, deep rosy pink, cowl neck shirt is an easy to wear top with some stretch. There are no closures you just pull it on over your head. The sleeves are a good length and the cowl neck is surprisingly easy to work with. Just make sure that the hem edge is on the inside of the shirt and let it fall and it will naturally slip into folds. It’s a pretty versatile top considering the specific design. You can wear it with jeans. trousers, or skirts and you can tuck it in or not. There are no buttons or zippers - you just slip it on over your head. I think this is a pretty quality option and will serve you well throughout fall and winter. The only thing I was unsure of was the extra fabric under the arms. It seemed like a dolman sleeve fit a bit but not enough to actually be a dolman sleeve.
The neckline is very fun! On a whole, it’s a tighter fabric, but I went a size up and I think I looks ok. You can dress it up or down. For reference: 5’6” and around 155 lb.

I ordered a size small and it fit true to size. The item arrived packaged well, and in a timely manner. Unfortunately, the white fabric is very thin, and see though. It feels cheap and doesn't wash up well, for this reason I have rated it two stars.
Perfect blouse for work or going to dinner. Lightweight and comfortable. Sized right.
It's very soft and very comfortable. The sizing is accurate, and it give a touch of class at social events.
Chic and current style very versatile fits true to size

Overall I liked this. The material is soft and good quality. It's shorter than I'd like but not TOO short (I'm 6' tall so it's probably "just right" for most women). The cowl neck is great - not too short or too long, and nice and loose. The material is generally a bit clingy but the arms are especially so. I'm not sure how much I'll wear it do to the arms. But I think many people would like this.

This top is a winner for the office, and for just about anyplace you want to look classy, yet elegant.  The material is ultra soft.  I like the way it fits. Great to add a belt. Easy to care for, dry on low heat.  The material is great for Fall weather, and you can wear this on a dinner date. all depends on the accessories and how low the skirt is.

评论概述: Nice top but the fabric quality isn't the greatest
评论详情: I ordered this in the XXL because, according to the size chart, that fit my measurements. It fits, but it seems like it runs a little small through the midsection and around bottom. I'm pretty busty, so I usually have a problem with tops fitting the girls and being too big around the bottom. But it's not too small for me in the bust and arms, so I guess it's just made to be a bit more fitted than I expected from the pictures of it on the model. You may want to go up a size if you don't want a snug fit in the body. The fabric was kind of "crunchy" when I first tried it on, but it softened up after washing and hanging it to dry. But it IS definitely more suitible for cooler weather because the fabric isn't very breathable, so I think it would be itchy and uncomfortable in warmer weather. It's also pretty thin. I got it in black and I can see through it a bit if I hold it up with any type of light source behind it. It's looked okay and nothing showed through when I tried it on with skin tone colored bra, but I think a white or brightly colored bra would show through. So have a feeling the lighter colors might be a bit see through when worn. On the plus side, it is a pretty top that I can wear with most of the bottoms in my wardrobe this fall and winter. The fabric has some stretch to it so it's comfortable to move in, and it has a slight "silky" sheen to it. The cowl neck drapes nicely without adding bulk, so it will work well on its own or under a cardigan or blazer. I got it to wear with a satin slip skirt to an event in October and it looks great with that, but it will also work nicely with jeans, trousers, or other types of skirts.

I got this shirt because I thought the neckline was interesting. After I opened it and looked at it even more closely. I really like the neckline. The material it’s made out of is kind of a silky smooth type material. We are in the middle of summer and record heat so I have not worn, the shirt, and it doesn’t look like I will be wearing it anytime soon because of the heat, but I am excited about it. I ordered the white because my wardrobe is Boring. White goes with almost everything, including under loose vest that I love to wear. This shirt is going to be a perfect addition to my cooler, weather wardrobe.

I'm so glad cowl necks are back in!  This top fits true to size.  The sleeves are a little long on me but that's to be expected because I'm short - it happens with every long sleeved shirt I own, unless they're sized specifically for petite.  The neckline hangs well and the fabric is light, stretchy, and comfortable.  The color is great for dressy evenings.

Overall I think this is a pretty nice shirt, quality seems overall very good for online ordered clothing. Personally pleased with this shirt, it actually does a good job of looking stylish, personally I let the neck ruffle thing be loosely tucked inside my bust area so that it hangs a bit and that looks pretty good. I got a size small and it fits me very well (5'7" 120lbs). The fabric is cool feeling to the touch and a bit stretchy, it is made of 95% polyester and 5% elastane. Fabric is thin but not super thin to the point of feeling cheap, it also has a nice texture which is something like thin vertical strips of fabric which overall feels nice to touch and to wear.
